This application allows users with mobile devices to view a low-latency video stream from a remote camera and to control the camera's pan and tilt motion by moving/rotating the mobile device.

For the controls to work properly, the device must be in landscape position; at the moment, it must be rotated 90 degrees clock-wise.

You may use the Lock/Unlock button on the camera view to toggle on/off the motion control of the camera. When you press the Unlock button for the first time, you will be asked to give permission for the page to access the mobile device orientation and motion events.

If the video stream becomes laggy or pixelated, please press the Reload button to reset the video stream.

Rotate the device 90 clock-wise into a landscape orientation and then press the start button below.
